title: Monospace Numbers
content:
Hi!

Wondering if anyone can name the typeface used in this design (for both numbers and words, looks like). Probably a monospace, but that could also be styling by the designer.

Thank you!!

Helen

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dd62f9bc67d00da444ffa91ca70a0c51_6032.jpg)

Font: 

 Abel, Google Font 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141122/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mtsthelen

comments.content:
Abel, a free Google web font:  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Abel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141122/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Abel "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Abel")
